Structs/Causality/Event.html#/s:9Causali.name: name
Structs/Causality/Event.html#/s:9Causali.abstract: name provides some context on the purpose of the event. It does not have to be unique. However, events of the same “name” will not be called even if they have the same message type.

Structs/Causality/Bus.html#/s:9Causality.name: queue
Structs/Causality/Bus.html#/s:9Causality.abstract: Queue on which to execute publish/subscribe actions to ensure thread safety

Structs/Causality/Bus.html#/s:9Causality.name: Subscription
Structs/Causality/Bus.html#/s:9Causality.abstract: Subscription identifier used by subscribers to be able to unsubscribe.

Structs/Causality/Bus.html#/s:9Causality.name: subscribe(_:handler:)
Structs/Causality/Bus.html#/s:9Causality.abstract: Add a subscriber to a specific event type

Structs/Causality/Bus.html#/s:9Causality.name: subscribe(_:queue:handler:)
Structs/Causality/Bus.html#/s:9Causality.abstract: Add a subscriber to a specific event type

Structs/Causality/Bus.html#/s:9Causality.name: subscribe(_:queue:handler:)
Structs/Causality/Bus.html#/s:9Causality.abstract: Add a subscriber to a specific event type

Structs/Causality/Bus.html#/s:9Causality.name: unsubscribe(_:)
Structs/Causality/Bus.html#/s:9Causality.abstract: Stop a particular subscription handler from listening to events anymore.

Structs/Causality.html#/s:9CausalityAAV1.name: globalQueue
Structs/Causality.html#/s:9CausalityAAV1.abstract: The queue used by the default bus for thread-safety. Also the default queue used for all buses (unless specified on initialization).

Structs/Causality/Bus.html.name: Bus
Structs/Causality/Bus.html.abstract: A Bus for events to go from publishers to subscribers

Structs/Causality/Event.html.name: Event
Structs/Causality/Event.html.abstract: Declare events to be used as endpoints for publish or subscribe calls.

Structs/Causality.html#/s:9CausalityAAV7.name: Message
Structs/Causality.html#/s:9CausalityAAV7.abstract: Custom types used as messages should conform to Message

Structs/Causality.html#/s:9CausalityAAV9.name: NoMessage
Structs/Causality.html#/s:9CausalityAAV9.abstract: A convenience message that can be included for events that have no associated data

Structs/Causality.html.name: Causality
Structs/Causality.html.abstract: Causality is a very simple event bus for Swift. Events may have associated data and are fully typed.
